about_the_game:
Albatross is a TPS designed with 2 current gamemodes for users to play with and includes a offline and multiplayer option. You can play any of the gamemodes with friends and try them all.

DISCLAIMER: This game is made by a learning 18 year old, Qureo Studios is the name of the group of which him and his friends make games
detailed_description:
Albatross is a TPS designed with 2 current gamemodes for users to play with and includes a offline and multiplayer option. You can play any of the gamemodes with friends and try them all.

DISCLAIMER: This game is made by a learning 18 year old, Qureo Studios is the name of the group of which him and his friends make games
name: Albatross

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 2600x
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080ti
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1660ti
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

reviews:
“The player base is pretty smol beans. Claymores OP. Dev deleted two other reviews so thats -1 star. Otherwise cwispy gameplay uwu”
4/5 –

“I like shooting and stabbing joe. If you hold knives while crouching and moving around each other in a circle it looks like you’re about to engage in a sumo battle. Very good game. If I were to change things with the game it would probably be to explain things a little better like the lethals and class perks. Oh and I would LOVE a testing range with like bots that don’t more to test out various perks and weapons”
5/5 –
short_description: Albatross is a TPS designed with 2 current gamemodes for users to play with and includes a offline and multiplayer option. You can play any of the gamemodes with friends and try them all. This game is made by a learning 18 year old.
